content: Janam: - balaheenarum paapikalumaaya njangalute mel anugrahangalum karunayum randulokangalilum ennu mennekkum choriyappetumaaraakaname. Aammeen,

/turakkamillaattha unarvullavanaaya ente kartthaave! Ninte unarvvine sthothram cheyyuvaanaayittu paapa muzhukalil ninnu njangalute urakkatthe unartthaname. Maranamillaattha jeevanullavane! Nin്re karunaye vandippaanaayi maranavum naashavumaakunna urakkatthil ninnu njangalute maranatthe nee jeevippikkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayume! Svarggatthilum bhoomiyilum sthuthikkappettavanum vaazhtthappettavanum nee aakayaal ninne sthuthikkunnavaraaya svarggeeyamaalaakhamaarute mahatthuvamulla vrundangalotorumicchu vishuddhiyotukooti ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninne sthuthicchu vaazhtthuvaan njangale yogyaraakkaname. Aammeen.

lokam rakshippaa-nekan suthanavathaaram cheyyumpol
/tmaathaavaaya kanyamariyaamine ette-
nnoru lekhanamezhuthi thaathan vittaan doothane nasaretthil.

/tnjangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

mohana sundaranaamangal
nalki poorvvikaneethijnjar
kanyaka daaveedin-makal mariyaaminnaayu.
'poottiya vaathili'thennevam haskkeeyelothi
'poottiya thottamatacchorutte'nnevam shlemoon:
/t'puri ennevam daaveedum;
/tjaathikale poshippippaan
vitthillaathe mulacchoru nal
sasyam thaan mashihaanaathan;
thal smruthi maanicchaan - oozhi'yilum melum.

1. Praarththicchaalum saubhaagyavathee praarththicchaalum
nin praarththanayaal naathan punyam nalkeetatte.

2. Kanyakamariyaam praarththikkumpoleerayanetthi
dyvatthaale preshitha'maakum shlommo nalki.

3. Shlommo chonnitteritheemayanaam doothan chonnaan
kanyaathvatthil nee aathmajane prasaviccheetum.

4. Shobhaapoornne! Petikkendaa thaathan ninnil
preethippettaanekasuthan than maathaavaakkaan.

5. Inneram nee vismayamerum garbham peri
shaashvatharaajyam vaazhum prajaye prasaviccheetum.

6. Ompathu maasam ninne ettol than praarththanayaal
dyvaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam.

sahadaa, kaadeesha-nmaare! Lokasahaayatthi-nnuravaayu
/tveeryam ningal than asthikkaayu thannon
/tdhanyan; naathankal ningal njangalkkaayu praarththikkenam.

/tnjangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

sathyatthe snehicchore!
Puthranu vendi maricchore!
Satthamare! Vaazhvaam ningal thannormma.
Anuthaapamezhum paapikal than thuramukhamaayu ningal.
Ningalilamarum mashihaayaam naathanotarththippin.
/tthannaagamanadine krupayum
/tvaazhtthum njangalkkaruleetaan.
Dyvikapeedtatthin mumpil
mukhathejasotee njangal
raapakalennennum sthothram paateetum.

haa! Bahumohana naadatthaal
evangelyonil naathan
kalppicchaan priyaraam uthsaahikalotaay:
aathmadaridranmaar dhanyar svarppuramaarjjikkum,
vilapicchamarunnor dhanyar netitumaashvaasam.
/peedaarddhitharum dhanyanmaar;
/thatharaam sahaderum dhanyar;
peedaykkum yaathanakalkkum
prathiphalamaayivaraarjjikkum
svarggatthotoppam shaashvathamaam jeevan.

kartthaave! Krupa cheyyaname
ninnatiyaar than praarththanayaal.

Nin vrutthaantham roohaayaal
chonnoraam nibi shleehanmaar,
snehaal mrutharaam sahadenmaar
praarththikkum, krupa cheyyenam.

Kartthaavinnishtam cheythor
nirmmalare! Praarththicchituvin,
njangalil ninnum neengeetaan
kopatthinnatiyum dandum

kartthaave krupa cheyyaname
ninnatiyaar than praarththanayaal;
njangalkkum mrutharaayorkkum
paapavimochanamekenam.

kartthaave! Nalkaashvaasam nin salbhavanangalkkullil
/tvaangippoyorkkaayu krupayi njangalkkum
atiyaarkkumavarkkum pattum kuttangal maatteetenam.

/tnjangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.

kartthaave! Aashvaasam nalku
uththaanatthin naalolam
thaathkkaalikamaamee jeevan
vitta pithaakkalkkum bhraathrujanangalkkum
kaanthiyezhunnarakalkkullil nalkeetaashvaasam;
avare orkkum naal kabarullasthikalariyenam
/tnin kalpana manmayaraamaa-
/tdaamyarkkuyirekeetumpol
kaanthi aninjittavar ninno-
toppam manavarayil pooki
uyirekum ninne sthothram cheyyenam.

aarkkaayu kaazhchachakaliviteyanay-
kkunno bhaagyamavannettam
mel svarggatthilavannormmayathundaakum.
Gothrapperukalormmaykkaayu kartthaavin mumpil
kaanmaan kallukalil mooshaa kotthiyathorkkumpol
/tningal than mrutharperukale
/torkkaanum, palliyilivite
ezhuthaanum, melsvarggatthil
mashihaathan varavil thanno-
tavar modippaanum cherppin pristhaayil.

2. Ninnil nidrayata-njaagamanam kaakkum
mrutharil shaanthiyana-cchekuka parihaaram

3. Nin abhaye mruthare-abraahaamisahaakku
yaakkobennivar than-matiyil paarppikka
